channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 06:56 Threat of Artbill! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 06:56 Threat of Artbill! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:34 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:34 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
